original_text: And they took them out of the tent and brought them to Joshua and to all the people of Israel. And they laid them down before the Lord.
korean_text: 그들이 그것을 장막 가운데서 취하여 여호수아와 이스라엘 모든 자손에게 가지고 오매 그들이 그것을 여호와 앞에 쏟아 놓으니라

sentences.original_text: And they took them out of the tent
and to all the people of Israel
And they laid them down before the Lord
